quote: It's very difficult for a black man to get out of South-Central Los Angeles, and get out civilized....The only men I know who have escaped, all began reading Robert Heinlein at age ten.
quote_letters: ITS VERY DIFFICULT FOR A BLACK MAN TO GET OUT OF SOUTH-CENTRAL LOS ANGELES AND GET OUT CIVILIZEDTHE ONLY MEN I KNOW WHO HAVE ESCAPED ALL BEGAN READING ROBERT HEINLEIN AT AGE TEN
